cause.description:
Join Action Team! Hi Everyone!
For each $5 donation one makes to Special Olympics New York, a rubber racing duck will be adopted in their name and entered into the race with a chance to win one Million Dollars, and other great prizes. These cool little ducks will race from the Brooklyn Bridge to the South Street Seaport as thousands cheer them on.
To join the excitement and adopt a duck go to: http://www.2007duckrace.kintera.org
To adopt a duck online is quick and easy. Click on the website above for the Million Dollar Duck Race Homepage. (If for some reason the url above is not clickable you can copy and paste it into your browser url bar).
Good Luck!
Follow This Link to visit the website and help me in my efforts to support Special Olympics New York
****************************************************************************** Some email systems do not support the use of links and therefore this link may not appear to work. If so, copy and paste the following into your browser: http://2007duckrace.kintera.org/faf/r.asp?t=12&i=233059&g=2035807 ******************************************************************************
1. achieve your dreams
2. nothing is impossible
3. love life
cause.name: Special Olympics Duck Race
